translation: BG 11.40:O Lord of infinite power, my salutations to You from the front and the rear, indeed from all sides! You possess infinite valor and might and pervade everything, and thus, You are everything.
commentary: Arjun continues with his glorification of Shree Krishna by declaring him asananta-vīrya(possessing infinite strength) andananta-vikramaḥ(immeasurably powerful). Overcome with awe, he offers his salutations to Shree Krishna from all sides, repeatedly exclaimingNamaḥ! Namaḥ!(I bow down to you again and again).
